algorithm_technique: Parity check based on coordinate values
problem_summary_simple: Determine if two chessboard squares, given by coordinates, have the same color.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates the parity of the sum of ASCII values of the coordinate characters.
key_insights: Chessboard coloring follows a pattern based on the parity of the sum of row and column indices.
The sum of the ASCII values of the coordinate characters (e.g., 'a1') captures this parity.
If the parity of the sum of character ASCII values is the same for two coordinates, they have the same color.
